query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_ota_deployments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  firmware_package_id INT NOT NULL,
  deployment_type ENUM('immediate','scheduled','phased') DEFAULT 'immediate',
  target_device_ids JSON NOT NULL,
  target_group_ids JSON,
  scheduled_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  phased_config JSON,
  total_devices INT DEFAULT 0,
  success_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  failed_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  pending_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  in_progress_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('draft','scheduled','in_progress','paused','completed','cancelled','failed') DEFAULT 'draft',
  started_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rollback_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  rollback_on_failure_percent INT DEFAULT 20,
  notify_on_complete INT DEFAULT 1,
  notify_on_failure INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_ota_deployment_firmware (firmware_package_id),
  INDEX idx_ota_deployment_status (status),
  INDEX idx_ota_deployment_scheduled (scheduled_at)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_ota_deployments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  firmware_package_id INT NOT NULL,
  deployment_type ENUM('immediate','scheduled','phased') DEFAULT 'immediate',
  target_device_ids JSON NOT NULL,
  target_group_ids JSON,
  scheduled_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  phased_config JSON,
  total_devices INT DEFAULT 0,
  success_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  failed_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  pending_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  in_progress_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('draft','scheduled','in_progress','paused','completed','cancelled','failed') DEFAULT 'draft',
  started_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rollback_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  rollback_on_failure_percent INT DEFAULT 20,
  notify_on_complete INT DEFAULT 1,
  notify_on_failure INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_ota_deployment_firmware (firmware_package_id),
  INDEX idx_ota_deployment_status (status),
  INDEX idx_ota_deployment_scheduled (scheduled_at)
);
